objects.specification: A large flat rectangular floor slab measuring six meters in width and four meters in depth, with a very low thickness of one centimeter. The surface has a smooth concrete texture and is uniformly colored in a dark gray (#505050) finish for contrast with the colorful furniture.

A tall flat rectangular back wall panel, six meters wide and three meters high, with a thickness of ten centimeters. It is finished in a neutral light gray (#C8C8C8) with a smooth matte paint surface.

A tall flat rectangular side wall panel, four meters deep and three meters high, with a thickness of ten centimeters. It is finished in a neutral light gray (#C8C8C8) with a smooth matte paint surface.

A tall flat rectangular side wall panel, four meters deep and three meters high, with a thickness of ten centimeters. It is finished in a neutral light gray (#C8C8C8) with a smooth matte paint surface.

A sleek modern registration desk measuring one and a half meters wide, sixty centimeters deep, and one meter high. It has clean straight edges, a glossy bright red finish (#DC143C), and a minimalist design suitable for front-of-booth welcome presentation.

A modern pedestal-style display stand, one meter tall with a square top half a meter wide and deep. It is rendered in a vibrant yellow (#FFD700) with a smooth glossy surface, oriented to face the front entrance.

A modern pedestal-style display stand, one meter tall with a square top half a meter wide and deep. It is rendered in a vibrant yellow (#FFD700) with a smooth glossy surface, oriented to face the front entrance.

A rectangular hanging banner three meters wide and one meter tall, colored in royal blue (#4169E1) with crisp white placeholder text. It has a slight fabric texture and is suspended horizontally above the booth entrance.
A compact round café-style table with a diameter of eighty centimeters and height of seventy-five centimeters, featuring a light wood grain finish and a single central pedestal base.

objects.specification: A slender matte black metal cylinder about five centimeters in diameter and thirty centimeters long, with a small warm yellow (#FFDF00) glowing sphere at its lower end. It hangs vertically and emits a warm, focused light.
